column1: The Pit Room////I ordered the brisket with potato salad and elote. I was so surprised at the taste of the elote
column2: it was savory goodness. The potato salad was decent as well. The brisket literally melts in your mouth
column3: is juicy and not dry. The BBQ sauce is more on the sour tangy side
column5: which is how I prefer it. I also got a lemonade to go with my meal
column6: it was great to have to wash down all this wonderful food.
